name: People, Paint, Play (Kinect Games)
description:
2015 - Present
Microsoft Kinect Interactive Games

Pick your choice of entertainment using the first model Kinect (Xbox 360) and any physical objects in the scene.

  • Paint on a digital canvas.
  • Play ping pong solo or with a challenger.
  • See how long you can dodge incoming obstacles.
  • Or simply catch falling objects for fun.
The game utilizes the raw infrared depth data and blob detection techniques to generate dynamic game objects.
